title: Send Customised email to the subscribed Email Address
description: Create an Event pattern which triggers the Lambda function to send email to the subscribed endpoint

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample pattern allows users to quickly deploy an Event pattern which triggers the Lambda function to send email to the subscribed endpoint.
By using this pattern, users can ensure that they will recieve an email as soon as the state of any Alarm changes
This pattern can be useful in scenarios where there is a need to integrate with custom notifications based upon the state of Alarm change
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
